S.FORM: Canada tatangahan:u siwkay nu kanatal u Canada sa ilabu nu kaamisan a Amilikaan, itiza i 45 00 N, 75 00 W, u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 9,984,670 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 9,093,507 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 891,163 km2, hamin nu tademawan sa 35,362,905. kakalukan umah sa 6.80%, kilakilangan umah sa 34.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 59.10%. tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Ottawa . sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sapadateng nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 7 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Elizabeth II, micakat a demiad sa i 1952 a mihca 2 bulad 6 demiad. u kulit nu hata nu Canda kanatal sa, situsa ku kulit, u sumanahay atu salengacay. i telung sa u papah nu kilang. uyniyan a kanatal, sienaw i kasienawan, yadah ku suledah i buyubuyuan. u hata u kulit nu hata nu kanatal sa, situsa a kulit. u sumanahay atu sangelacay. u sulit nu zuma a kamu u sulit nu Hulam: 加拿大 u sulit nu Lipun: カナダ u sulit nu Amilika: Canada Canada kamu nu United Kingdom, kamu nu France, Canada, IPA u kaku sa/'kænədə/(ing a kamu)/kanada/(ba'a kamu)"i kaamisan a Amilikaan (Pey-miy-zuw a kanatal, nutipan i sasa nu waliyu , nuwalian a katukuh i saetipyu , nuamisan a kuli a bayu katukuh i Ba-bing-yang, nuwalian nuwamisanay atu Denmark a lalaan mapapauwan tu Greenland, nuwamisan atu Sen-pi-ye mapapauwan tu Mi-ke-lung-yung-daw , tunulan atu satipan atu A-mi-li-ka matatulas ku lala', Canada a ku ahebal nu lala', pakala tu 998 a bang 4,670 km2, mahamin i kitakit ku a hebal sakatusa nu tabakiay a kanatal, satu u macakatay a kanatalan, u satabakiay nu hekal a lala'. singanga tu a kanatal han. (u sulit nu hulam: Canada 英語,法語:Canada,IPA讀音:/'kænədə/ /kanada/ ) .) uyni u macakatay a kanatalan a hebal ku lala', uynian a kanatal kahenulan a tuse u Ottawa , kahenulan a tuse u Vancouver (Wen-ke-hua 溫哥華), Toronto (Du-lun-du 多倫多) atu Montreal (Men-te-lou 蒙特婁), hamin u kanatal cacay a bataan a kenis atu nisapulungan tu tuluay a kakitizaan, Canada mapasilut nu Bu-bi-se shì"富比士"i 2020 a mihcaan miales mabulaw nueneng singangan tunian a kanatal. Canada i ayaw nu 1,400 a mihcaan izaw tu ku yuancumin mauzip, kasumamadan tu sazikuzan tu 15 a mihcaan, United Kingdom atu France micumutay a tademawan malingatu tu amisuninip tu nuwamisan a Amilikan a nuwalian a tukus satu i tini patizeng tu micunutay a tademaw, 1763 a mihcaan , yu pituay a mihcaan namalepun ku ngangayaw hawsa France mapacici' tu mahamin tu ku nuwamisan a Amilikan a micunutay makelap pabeli tu United Kingdom). kilul satu tu pinaay a cacay bataan a mihcaan, United Kingdom nu mitebungay a tademaw pasaysatipan amin suninip tu tay-ping -yang a kakitizaan patizeng satu pinaay tu baluhay nu micumutay a tademaw, 1867 a mihcaan 7 a bulad 1 a demiad, 1867 a mihcaan maawas tu ku nipahulican a hulic, Canada a kenis maletak u An-da-luy atu Kuy-be-ke a kenis, atu baluhay Bu-lan-zi-wiy atu Sin-se-ke-si-ys tulu ku United Kingdom tungusay a nuwamisan a Amilikan micunutay misakaput tu Canada a malapulungan a kanatal , kilul tu pinaay a mihcaan, u zuma tu pinaay tu a lala'an, United Kingdom tungusay a nuwamisan a Amilikan nu micunutay tahekalay tunuan a lala', lalit amicumut tu malapulungan a kanatal , misakaput tu ayzaay a ziday, nu Canada , 1931 a mihcaan 12 a bulad 11 a demiad, United Kingdom maawas tu Si-min a saculcul a hulic, u Canada mala u masatekeday a kanatal, nika u mikelitay nu kanatal mahizatu u nitauyaay a nu United Kingdom Hung-tiay a kanatal ci Ciaw-ce-uw-se , u United Kingdom a Kuw-hey mahizatu ami emec tu Canada ni kayzuan a hulic. i kasumamadan nu Yuan-cu-min duduc tuni uni micekuway tu susumamaday hehay atu tuud u mi su subelidan tu nipasubanaan pinanaman, sayadah i 24,500 a mihcaan ayaw nayay i tini nuwamisan izaw tu ku tademawan a mi kawaw, i tiniay i tumulay An-da-lue a tademaw mikawaway a tademaw, tateng a mikilim i tiza i ayaw nu kasumamadan tu 7,500 a mihcaan, Ciw-ke-luo-pin-ti masaenalay a enal, atu Lan-uy-dung-siey buhang nisubelidan i kasasumamadan tu ni kauzip nuheni i lalabu nu kanatal a Canada u kasumamadan u sabalakiay a tademawan i tiza nueneng, siykay nu Yuan-cu-min u mizidekay a kakitizaan pasu matenesay nuenengay u kaluk kukawaw paluma'malalemelay u masaeletay u hini u satalakaw atu pacakayay a Wang-lu , nu zuma a yincumin kacakat nu siy-kay i Europe nu micumuday a tademaw katukuh i ayaw nu Canada maliwasak tu imahini pakaawas dada' tu kutkutan tu nu kasumamadan a tuud micekiw tuyzaan u nu makapatay a siy-kay. (u sulit nu hulam: .) i laylayan nau United Kingdom atu France kumicumudaay yunian a lala' Canada a lalangawan namalilit nu tusaay a kanatal atu yincumin a lalangawan tu nu kasumamadan nu babalaki a nikauzip, unian u kamu nu yincumin n nalimaan atu dadiw mahizatu malilit nu Canada a tademawan ktuud ku Canadaay a tademaw , sadi'men miazih tu yadahay a lalangawan, maazih ku yadahay a lalangawan uynian akanatal saan. (u sulit nu hulam: .) Canada a kanatal mahiza malilit nu tahak, laylay malilit nu lalay atu yincumin i mahiza u alingul nu kanatalay mahiza tu nu laylay mitalaayaw tu kasumamadan tu 18 a mihcaan, matudung makulit ku alingul i ayaw atu ayzaay hata nu Canada , cacay a kalibuwa atu I kanatalay atu Canada-ku-huy ipabaw, nu zumaay a kanatal mahiza izaw henay u He-li , Canada ngaciw Pu-tung-cang-niaw atu Hung-ya-cia-na-ta-ciy-cing . kasumamadan tu 1,000 a mihcaanay tu, Europe (O-cuo 歐洲) a tademaw saayaway a mipaemek tu nian a Canada , sumanahay a ngisngis ci Ay-zuy-ke nai Niw-ben-lan-daw a subal Lan-say- aw-ce-mu-caw-di patizeng pacena' nuengen i tiza namakay Pay-o nu micumutay hawsa, Canada ketenes tu demiad caay tu katadebin atu Europe (O-cuw 歐洲), katukuh 1497 a mihcaan Italy a tademaw ci Caw-wa-ni-ka-bu-tu nu England nu misuninipay nu Canada i saetipyu a bayuan, i kasumamadan tu 16 a mihcaan, Pa-se-ce atu Portugal i bayuay a tademaw i saetipyu a tukus patizang tu nu puu'ay miala tu cing atu mibuting i tiza, 1534 a mihcaan France nu miteswkay tu bayu a tademaw ci Ya-ce-ka-di-ya misumimip i Sen-lu-lun-se-wan , atu i 7 bulad 24 a demiad tu France ci Fa-lan-suo-wa-i'-se a ngangan tuyza a lala' miala tuyza a lala'an. kasumamadan tu 20 a mihcaan, u misakakuay mikuwanay nu Canada makelap nu United Kingdom tunu zumaay a kawaw sisa United Kingdom tuni a ngangayaw pakaynian tu ngangayaw hawsa Canada milihiza tu ngangayaw mapaculcul pasayza i satipan a ngangayawan nu Canada milihizaay a hitay a misakaput mala u tabakiay a salaput a hitay nu kalahitayay a Canad uynian a hitay i Wy-mi-ling-can-iy a ngangayaw au nu zumaay kulahenulan a ngangayawan u mala u sakahenulan a tademaw, milihiza tunian a ngangayaw 650,000 ku tademaw, u nu Canadaay a tademaw, pakala tu 173,000 a mapatayay a tademaw 173,000 madukaay a tademaw. Canada maala tu ku nuwamisanay mahamin nu kakatizaan nu Pa-mi-cuw , nu zumaay a lala' makaysatipan nu waliyu a kakitizaan, lalid katukuh i nusawalian nu saetipyu a kakitizaan, nuwamisan nayad katukuh i nuwamisan u sikuliay a bayu, u nian Greenland a kanatal u nu sawalian satipan, Sen-pi-ye-yu-mi-ke-lung-sung-daw i nu tinulan Newfoundland u pulung nu ahebal nu lala', pasu i hekalay a lala'(atu nanumay a lala')Canada hamin a kanatal sakatusa tabakiay a kanatal dada' I Russia u nian dada' i hekalay a lala' u piasip tu a hebal ciniza mahamin i kitakit, u sakasepat nu satabakiay namakay, 1925 a mihcaan malingatu tu Canada tu kamu satipan 60 du katukuh 141du nu bay-ci a kakitizaan tu uynian a lala' nika mahiza caay kakatuud ku palatatenga'ay, ciniza i kitakitan u saamisay nuenengay nu tademawan, u hitay i Ay-lel-se-mi-lel-daw subalan tu Canada-cung-tuy-cing-paw-cang . (u sulit nu hulam: 自1925年起, .) cen-ce cenhu政治政府 Canada a zen-ze a nikuwan u hung-ti ku mipahulicay tu I-huy-ce , u nian ku San-cun-ban-li , tu ni situngusay Li-ba-cuan , Se-ba-cuan atu Sin-zen-cuan makayni I hung-ti nu Ca-na-da-cun-ku ku pahulicay ayzaay a hung-ti,u tatayna a hung-ti ci I'-li-sa-bay-e'-se , cinza mahizatu nu zumaay sabaw limaay u masatekeday tu Da-in-ku-siy a kanatal a hung-ti. uynian a kanatal u Canada a gingku uynian a kanatal tu Cung-yan a gingku, ci Se-di-ben-pu-luo-ce ku mikuwanay u kalisiw nu tapang atu nu kuziay a tapang, u Canada u nisulitan sapasilut tu ni lekakawa u zaysan nu Canada . (u sulit nu hulam: .) tademaw人口 kilul tunisalitan 2016 a mihcaan tu nipikingsa tu tademaw, Canada nu nuenengay a tademaw pulung izaw ku 35,151,728, palecad tu 2011 a mihcaan macunus tu pakalal tu 5.0%, i 1871 a mihcaan Canada a saayaway ku piking sat u tademaw macunus tu 10 u kacakat. kilul tu nusulitan Canada加拿大 a tademaw misakaku atu misatekeday a hulic, sakasabaw tulua ceding,atu nu邦官方語言法案kanatak a hulic,atu nu Canada a kamu anipahulic Canada a kamu u 英語和法語. (u sulit nu hulam: .) lalangawan文化 Canada a kanatal u sayadahay a binacadan a tademaw, u lalangawan paka pabinacadan malilit tu yadah tu masazumaay a lalangawan, kayadah nu lalangawan maading nu ni pahulican i Quebec (Kuy-bay-ce-seng 魁北克省) ,Quebec a tademawan , matineng au zanan a tademawan a saan. (u sulit nu hulam: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA 外交部 加拿大 カナダ Canada

Canada tatangahan:o siwkay no kanatal o Canada sa ilabo no kaamisan a Amilikaan, itiza i 45 00 N, 75 00 W, o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 9,984,670 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa izaw ko 9,093,507 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 891,163 km2, hamin no tademawan sa 35,362,905. kakalokan omah sa 6.80%, kilakilangan omah sa 34.10%, zomaay henay omah sa 59.10%. tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Ottawa . sapadateng no kanatal demiad sapadateng no kanatal demiad sa 1 bolad 7 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Elizabeth II, micakat a demiad sa i 1952 a mihca 2 bolad 6 demiad. o kolit no hata no Canda kanatal sa, sitosa ko kolit, o somanahay ato salengacay. i telong sa o papah no kilang. oyniyan a kanatal, sienaw i kasienawan, yadah ko soledah i boyoboyoan. o hata o kolit no hata no kanatal sa, sitosa a kolit. o somanahay ato sangelacay. o solit no zoma a kamo o solit no Holam: 加拿大 o solit no Lipon: カナダ o solit no Amilika: Canada Canada kamo no United Kingdom, kamo no France, Canada, IPA o kako sa/'kænədə/(ing a kamo)/kanada/(ba'a kamo)"i kaamisan a Amilikaan (Pey-miy-zow a kanatal, notipan i sasa no waliyo , nowalian a katokoh i saetipyo , noamisan a koli a bayo katokoh i Ba-bing-yang, nowalian nowamisanay ato Denmark a lalaan mapapaowan to Greenland, nowamisan ato Sen-pi-ye mapapaowan to Mi-ke-long-yong-daw , tonolan ato satipan ato A-mi-li-ka matatolas ko lala', Canada a ko ahebal no lala', pakala to 998 a bang 4,670 km2, mahamin i kitakit ko a hebal sakatosa no tabakiay a kanatal, sato o macakatay a kanatalan, o satabakiay no hekal a lala'. singanga to a kanatal han. (o solit no holam: Canada 英語,法語:Canada,IPA讀音:/'kænədə/ /kanada/ ) .) oyni o macakatay a kanatalan a hebal ko lala', oynian a kanatal kahenolan a tose o Ottawa , kahenolan a tose o Vancoover (Wen-ke-hoa 溫哥華), Toronto (Do-lon-do 多倫多) ato Montreal (Men-te-loo 蒙特婁), hamin o kanatal cacay a bataan a kenis ato nisapolongan to toloay a kakitizaan, Canada mapasilot no Bo-bi-se shì"富比士"i 2020 a mihcaan miales mabolaw noeneng singangan tonian a kanatal. Canada i ayaw no 1,400 a mihcaan izaw to ko yoancomin maozip, kasomamadan to sazikozan to 15 a mihcaan, United Kingdom ato France micomotay a tademawan malingato to amisoninip to nowamisan a Amilikan a nowalian a tokos sato i tini patizeng to miconotay a tademaw, 1763 a mihcaan , yo pitoay a mihcaan namalepon ko ngangayaw hawsa France mapacici' to mahamin to ko nowamisan a Amilikan a miconotay makelap pabeli to United Kingdom). kilol sato to pinaay a cacay bataan a mihcaan, United Kingdom no mitebongay a tademaw pasaysatipan amin soninip to tay-ping -yang a kakitizaan patizeng sato pinaay to balohay no micomotay a tademaw, 1867 a mihcaan 7 a bolad 1 a demiad, 1867 a mihcaan maawas to ko nipaholican a holic, Canada a kenis maletak o An-da-loy ato Koy-be-ke a kenis, ato balohay Bo-lan-zi-wiy ato Sin-se-ke-si-ys tolo ko United Kingdom tongosay a nowamisan a Amilikan miconotay misakapot to Canada a malapolongan a kanatal , kilol to pinaay a mihcaan, o zoma to pinaay to a lala'an, United Kingdom tongosay a nowamisan a Amilikan no miconotay tahekalay tonoan a lala', lalit amicomot to malapolongan a kanatal , misakapot to ayzaay a ziday, no Canada , 1931 a mihcaan 12 a bolad 11 a demiad, United Kingdom maawas to Si-min a sacolcol a holic, o Canada mala o masatekeday a kanatal, nika o mikelitay no kanatal mahizato o nitaoyaay a no United Kingdom Hong-tiay a kanatal ci Ciaw-ce-ow-se , o United Kingdom a Kow-hey mahizato ami emec to Canada ni kayzoan a holic. i kasomamadan no Yoan-co-min dodoc toni oni micekoway to sosomamaday hehay ato tood o mi so sobelidan to nipasobanaan pinanaman, sayadah i 24,500 a mihcaan ayaw nayay i tini nowamisan izaw to ko tademawan a mi kawaw, i tiniay i tomolay An-da-loe a tademaw mikawaway a tademaw, tateng a mikilim i tiza i ayaw no kasomamadan to 7,500 a mihcaan, Ciw-ke-loo-pin-ti masaenalay a enal, ato Lan-oy-dong-siey bohang nisobelidan i kasasomamadan to ni kaozip noheni i lalabo no kanatal a Canada o kasomamadan o sabalakiay a tademawan i tiza noeneng, siykay no Yoan-co-min o mizidekay a kakitizaan paso matenesay noenengay o kalok kokawaw paloma'malalemelay o masaeletay o hini o satalakaw ato pacakayay a Wang-lo , no zoma a yincomin kacakat no siy-kay i Eorope no micomoday a tademaw katokoh i ayaw no Canada maliwasak to imahini pakaawas dada' to kotkotan to no kasomamadan a tood micekiw toyzaan o no makapatay a siy-kay. (o solit no holam: .) i laylayan nao United Kingdom ato France komicomodaay yonian a lala' Canada a lalangawan namalilit no tosaay a kanatal ato yincomin a lalangawan to no kasomamadan no babalaki a nikaozip, onian o kamo no yincomin n nalimaan ato dadiw mahizato malilit no Canada a tademawan ktood ko Canadaay a tademaw , sadi'men miazih to yadahay a lalangawan, maazih ko yadahay a lalangawan oynian akanatal saan. (o solit no holam: .) Canada a kanatal mahiza malilit no tahak, laylay malilit no lalay ato yincomin i mahiza o alingol no kanatalay mahiza to no laylay mitalaayaw to kasomamadan to 18 a mihcaan, matodong makolit ko alingol i ayaw ato ayzaay hata no Canada , cacay a kalibowa ato I kanatalay ato Canada-ko-hoy ipabaw, no zomaay a kanatal mahiza izaw henay o He-li , Canada ngaciw Po-tong-cang-niaw ato Hong-ya-cia-na-ta-ciy-cing . kasomamadan to 1,000 a mihcaanay to, Eorope (O-coo 歐洲) a tademaw saayaway a mipaemek to nian a Canada , somanahay a ngisngis ci Ay-zoy-ke nai Niw-ben-lan-daw a sobal Lan-say- aw-ce-mo-caw-di patizeng pacena' noengen i tiza namakay Pay-o no micomotay hawsa, Canada ketenes to demiad caay to katadebin ato Eorope (O-cow 歐洲), katokoh 1497 a mihcaan Italy a tademaw ci Caw-wa-ni-ka-bo-to no England no misoninipay no Canada i saetipyo a bayoan, i kasomamadan to 16 a mihcaan, Pa-se-ce ato Portogal i bayoay a tademaw i saetipyo a tokos patizang to no poo'ay miala to cing ato miboting i tiza, 1534 a mihcaan France no miteswkay to bayo a tademaw ci Ya-ce-ka-di-ya misomimip i Sen-lo-lon-se-wan , ato i 7 bolad 24 a demiad to France ci Fa-lan-soo-wa-i'-se a ngangan toyza a lala' miala toyza a lala'an. kasomamadan to 20 a mihcaan, o misakakoay mikowanay no Canada makelap no United Kingdom tono zomaay a kawaw sisa United Kingdom toni a ngangayaw pakaynian to ngangayaw hawsa Canada milihiza to ngangayaw mapacolcol pasayza i satipan a ngangayawan no Canada milihizaay a hitay a misakapot mala o tabakiay a salapot a hitay no kalahitayay a Canad oynian a hitay i Wy-mi-ling-can-iy a ngangayaw ao no zomaay kolahenolan a ngangayawan o mala o sakahenolan a tademaw, milihiza tonian a ngangayaw 650,000 ko tademaw, o no Canadaay a tademaw, pakala to 173,000 a mapatayay a tademaw 173,000 madokaay a tademaw. Canada maala to ko nowamisanay mahamin no kakatizaan no Pa-mi-cow , no zomaay a lala' makaysatipan no waliyo a kakitizaan, lalid katokoh i nosawalian no saetipyo a kakitizaan, nowamisan nayad katokoh i nowamisan o sikoliay a bayo, o nian Greenland a kanatal o no sawalian satipan, Sen-pi-ye-yo-mi-ke-long-song-daw i no tinolan Newfoondland o polong no ahebal no lala', paso i hekalay a lala'(ato nanomay a lala')Canada hamin a kanatal sakatosa tabakiay a kanatal dada' I Rossia o nian dada' i hekalay a lala' o piasip to a hebal ciniza mahamin i kitakit, o sakasepat no satabakiay namakay, 1925 a mihcaan malingato to Canada to kamo satipan 60 do katokoh 141do no bay-ci a kakitizaan to oynian a lala' nika mahiza caay kakatood ko palatatenga'ay, ciniza i kitakitan o saamisay noenengay no tademawan, o hitay i Ay-lel-se-mi-lel-daw sobalan to Canada-cong-toy-cing-paw-cang . (o solit no holam: 自1925年起, .) cen-ce cenho政治政府 Canada a zen-ze a nikowan o hong-ti ko mipaholicay to I-hoy-ce , o nian ko San-con-ban-li , to ni sitongosay Li-ba-coan , Se-ba-coan ato Sin-zen-coan makayni I hong-ti no Ca-na-da-con-ko ko paholicay ayzaay a hong-ti,o tatayna a hong-ti ci I'-li-sa-bay-e'-se , cinza mahizato no zomaay sabaw limaay o masatekeday to Da-in-ko-siy a kanatal a hong-ti. oynian a kanatal o Canada a gingko oynian a kanatal to Cong-yan a gingko, ci Se-di-ben-po-loo-ce ko mikowanay o kalisiw no tapang ato no koziay a tapang, o Canada o nisolitan sapasilot to ni lekakawa o zaysan no Canada . (o solit no holam: .) tademaw人口 kilol tonisalitan 2016 a mihcaan to nipikingsa to tademaw, Canada no noenengay a tademaw polong izaw ko 35,151,728, palecad to 2011 a mihcaan maconos to pakalal to 5.0%, i 1871 a mihcaan Canada a saayaway ko piking sat o tademaw maconos to 10 o kacakat. kilol to nosolitan Canada加拿大 a tademaw misakako ato misatekeday a holic, sakasabaw toloa ceding,ato no邦官方語言法案kanatak a holic,ato no Canada a kamo anipaholic Canada a kamo o 英語和法語. (o solit no holam: .) lalangawan文化 Canada a kanatal o sayadahay a binacadan a tademaw, o lalangawan paka pabinacadan malilit to yadah to masazomaay a lalangawan, kayadah no lalangawan maading no ni paholican i Qoebec (Koy-bay-ce-seng 魁北克省) ,Qoebec a tademawan , matineng ao zanan a tademawan a saan. (o solit no holam: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA 外交部 加拿大 カナダ Canada
